title: S13 Ep58: The Minnesota Monster Man
itunes:title: The Minnesota Monster Man
description:
Michael Hexum has had 2 face to face encounters with the elusive Bigfoot creatures of Nothern Minnesota. This set him on his path to track and explore this hidden realm, even the team from Finding Bigfoot called upon him to help them in their quest.

Follow our guest & his group here:
https://www.facebook.com/Minnesota-Bigfoot-Research-Team-199324126773240/

Psychic Source has special pricing for listeners, call 855-453-2000 or visit PsychicSource.com and use promo code DARKNESS for a limited time introductory rate.

Visit www.TrueCar.com when you are ready to make a purchase of a new or used vehicle.
